record.field: Key in Server name and User ID which you get from USPS website.

tree.colors: blue:state in ('draft');grey:state in ('cancel');red:state not in ('cancel', 'done') and date < current_date

field.attrs: {'required':[('service_type_usps','in',('First Class','First Class HFP Commercial'))], 'invisible':[('service_type_usps','not in',('First Class','First Class HFP Commercial'))]}
